name: Total Singu
description:
Total Singu is a top down shooter. Follow the main character Singu, through this short but epic narrative. Discover and uncover the journey though 15 levels of exploration and find out what it means to be Total Singu.

Creator note:
Created on the Stencyl Engine, Total Singu is my first complete game project on this scale. It took me a few months of working on/ learning to get this far. I hope you enjoy the game as much as i enjoyed creating it. I have had a lot of positive feedback from the community over the months of building the game. I would like to thank you for the continued support you have given me.
